chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface

Goal:
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply votesWithLog_sorted

Premises:
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> gd = fst (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p ::
votesWithLog_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (h' : name) (log : list entry), In (t, h', log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h))) -> sorted log : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votesWithLog_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable (deghost net) } Arguments raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope

logs_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => logs_sorted_host net /\ logs_sorted_nw net /\ packets_gt_prevIndex net /\ packets_ge_prevTerm net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
execute_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (log : list entry) => execute_log' log init [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope
init_handlers = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) => mkRaft_data 0 None None [] 0 0 init [] [] false [] Follower [] [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data Arguments init_handlers {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_raft_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_refinement_interface
multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

elections_ghost_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| ghost_data := electionsData; ghost_init := {| votes := []; votesWithLog := []; cronies := fun _ : term => []; leaderLogs := []; allEntries := [] |}; ghost_net_handlers := update_elections_data_net; ghost_input_handlers := update_elections_data_input |} : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), GhostMultiParams multi_params Arguments elections_ghost_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n prevT prevI entries c -> sorted entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_gt_prevIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eIndex e > pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_gt_prevIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
